summary: Store and Vote sections were added, wired to new siteConfig fields, and linked from SiteNav and Footer with smooth scrolling. One acceptance-criteria mismatch is that the Vote section heading is not exactly "Vote". The requested logo/hero image asset swaps are not evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: A new section exists with id="vote" and a visible heading "Vote".
missing_requirements.reason: The section id is "vote", but the visible heading text is "Vote for Us" rather than exactly "Vote".

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current logo asset with the uploaded image (cooper-smp-logo.dim_512x512.png) and create/update a hero background derived from the uploaded image (cooper-smp-hero-bg.dim_1920x800.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows code referencing the logo path; it does not show any changes/additions to the actual image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor any update for the hero background asset.
